subject: The Speakup Reflecter is back up!
body:
Hi all.  The Speakup Reflecter is back up at gene3.ait.iastate.edu:4074.
The backup reflecter on gene2.ait.iastate.edu is no longer available. 
Thanks for your patience.

Gene
